whole_object: This room is so impeccably clean, you'd think the dust bunnies have been evicted for not paying rent!
single_object:
- Sofa: This sofa's so good at comfort, it's been promoted to 'chief relaxation officer'!
- Cushions: The cushions' motto is 'support you can count on' – literally.
- Coffee table: This coffee table is a 'board' member of the living room's interior design committee.
- Glasses: These glasses have a clear vision for quenching your thirst.
- Tray: This tray holds its position well, never spilling the beans about its contents.
- Paintings: The painting's hanging out, enjoying a bit of wall-time.
- Fireplace: The fireplace is so cool, it's hot property in the room.
- Rug: This rug really ties the room together without getting knotty.
- Bookshelves: The bookshelves are so well-read, they can shelf-help themselves!
multi_object:
- Sofa  
- Cushions  
- The sofa is so comfortable, even the cushions are taking a nap!

- Cushions  
- Coffee table  
- The cushions are so fluffy, they could start a pillow fight with the coffee table!

- Coffee table  
- Glasses  
- The coffee table is always the life of the party, but it can't handle the pressure of the glasses!

- Glasses  
- Tray  
- The glasses are feeling a bit empty, but the tray is always ready to serve up some fun!

- Tray  
- Paintings  
- The tray is tired of holding snacks; it wants to be a canvas for the paintings!

- Paintings  
- Fireplace  
- The paintings are hanging around, hoping the fireplace will spark some conversation!

- Fireplace  
- Rug  
- The fireplace is so hot, it makes the rug feel like it's on fire—figuratively, of course!

- Rug  
- Bookshelves  
- The rug is tired of being walked on; it wants to be the star of a story from the bookshelves! 

- Bookshelves  
- Sofa  
- The bookshelves are stacked with stories, but the sofa is the one that really knows how to relax!

multi_object_dict.object_sentence: The sofa is so comfortable, even the cushions are taking a nap!
The cushions are so fluffy, they could start a pillow fight with the coffee table!
The coffee table is always the life of the party, but it can't handle the pressure of the glasses!
The glasses are feeling a bit empty, but the tray is always ready to serve up some fun!
The tray is tired of holding snacks; it wants to be a canvas for the paintings!
The paintings are hanging around, hoping the fireplace will spark some conversation!
The fireplace is so hot, it makes the rug feel like it's on fire—figuratively, of course!
The rug is tired of being walked on; it wants to be the star of a story from the bookshelves!
The bookshelves are stacked with stories, but the sofa is the one that really knows how to relax!
